job1.title: Data Analyst
job1.company: Telus International AI Data Solutions, Montreal, QC
job1.detail1: Assessed AI-generated responses for accuracy and relevance according to strict guidelines.
job1.detail2: Evaluated diverse data inputs like Google Maps, audio, and images for accuracy.
job1.detail3: Conducted research to resolve data inconsistencies, improving report precision.

job2.title: Tutor/Teacher Assistant for Computer Science
job2.detail1: Provided guidance to first and second-year students on Python programming, focusing on automation scripts and data processing using Pandas, Openpyxl, and Matplotlib.
job2.detail2: Assisted students in leveraging Python for Excel-based tasks, enhancing their problem-solving and automation skills.
job2.detail3: Facilitated hands-on coding workshops and debugging sessions, helping students understand core programming concepts and improve their ability to write efficient, maintainable code.

about.name: Name
about.title: About Me
about.description1: I thrive at the intersection of software development, problem-solving, and collaboration. As an AI & Data Analyst at Telus, I refined data pipelines and ensured accuracy in large-scale datasets. My expertise spans full-stack development, microservices, and web services, utilizing Java, Python, Flask, React.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB to build scalable applications.
about.description2: In school, I worked in Scrum teams on projects involving Java Spring Boot backends, RESTful APIs, React/TypeScript frontends, and cloud-based microservices. Beyond coding, my experience at the Bell Center strengthened my ability to communicate effectively and perform under pressure.
